Trigger.Name: 01 - First Trash
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^|]*\|0044\|N-7000\|<whirr> Stigma-4 detected! Eliminate the unit guarding it and destroy its core!

Trigger.Name: 03 - Second Trash
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^|]*\|0044\|N-7000\|The Lambda unit before you was produced in Gordhona with local materials, as became our standard operating protocol\.

Trigger.Name: 05 - Last Trash
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^00\|[^|]*\|0044\|N-7000\|<whirr> Access to Stigma-4's perceived “self” confirmed! Destroy this core to overwrite its expectation of victory\.

Trigger.Name: 00 - Instance Start
Trigger.Description: Please set this to your Start/Next Split global hotkey for LiveSplit.

Trigger.Name: X - Send to LiveSplit
Trigger.Description: Edit IP and port as necessary. Use 127.0.0.1 for localhost.
